          <title>
            <string language="fr">Rayonnement des substances radioactives</string>
            <string language="en">Radiation from radioactive substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung von den radioaktiven Substanzen</string>

          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre des sources radioactives  émettant différents types de rayonnement.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows radioactive sources emitting different types of radiation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnement d'alpha</string>
            <string language="en">alpha radiation</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die radioaktiven Quellen, die
unterschiedliche Typen der Strahlung ausstrahlen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as fontes radioativas que 
emitem-se tipos diferentes de radiação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra le sorgenti radioattive che 
emettono i tipi differenti di radiazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ραδιενεργές πηγές 
εκπέμποντας τους διαφορετικούς τύπους ακτινοβολιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra las fuentes radiactivas que
emiten diversos tipos de radiación.</string>
